long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
𝗯𝗹𝗼𝘁𝘂𝗽 is the ultimate tool for development teams including, managers, developers, designers, testers to enhance collaboration directly on live webpages. With 𝗯𝗹𝗼𝘁𝘂𝗽, you can easily highlight text, mark specific areas, and add detailed comments to any web content.
The 𝗻𝗲𝘄 𝗔𝗜 𝗳𝗲𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲 automatically detects a range of issues, from visible and functionality problems to SEO-related concerns, AI-detected text, and grammar checks, streamlining your workflow and ensuring thorough evaluations.
Whether you’re working on design feedback, QA testing, or development tasks, 𝗯𝗹𝗼𝘁𝘂𝗽 streamlines your workflow by keeping all your notes and issues in one place.

Key Features:
- 𝗛𝗶𝗴𝗵𝗹𝗶𝗴𝗵𝘁 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗠𝗮𝗿𝗸 𝗔𝗿𝗲𝗮𝘀: Select text or mark any web component—divisions, buttons, links—to annotate directly on the website.

- 𝗥𝗲𝗮𝗹-𝗧𝗶𝗺𝗲 𝗖𝗼𝗹𝗹𝗮𝗯𝗼𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻: See and respond to comments instantly with threaded discussions, ensuring everyone is on the same page.

- 𝗜𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗴𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗣𝗼𝗽𝘂𝗹𝗮𝗿 𝗧𝗼𝗼𝗹𝘀: Seamlessly integrate with GitHub, Slack, and ClickUp to streamline your workflow and enhance productivity.
